snippet: A proposal by Dave Camp of the House Ways and Means Committee would change the way derivatives are taxed and the way capital gains are calculated, Floyd Norris writes in The New York Times. Earlier this month, Victor Fleischer, a columnist for...
abstract: A proposal by Dave Camp of the House Ways and Means Committee would change the way derivatives are taxed and the way capital gains are calculated, Floyd Norris writes in The New York Times. Earlier this month, Victor Fleischer, a columnist for DealBook, praised the measure.
